name: OsmAnd
releaseNotes:
• Added initial support for Android Auto
• User interface update for UTM coordinate search
• GPS Filter for GPX Tracks
• Elevation Widget (Pro)
• Favorites: added ability to view recently used icons
• Route planning: will use the selected profile after launch
• Fixed Mapillary layer, the plugin is now disabled by default
• Added screen to manage all history in the app
• Map orientation is not reset after restarting the app
• Improved SRTM height marker rendering
• Fixed Arabic map captions

reviews.review: Great app. But reversing routes from a preset gpx file is harder than it should be. I did it once, now for the life of me, I can't do it again. Uninstalled to see I I'm missing something.
Traffic Traffic jams and speed cams missing
Good

Hi, Im unable to import a gpx file that I found on the internet. I do import track and nothing happens. Im sure its not the gpx file that is bad because it works in other apps. Does this only work in paid version? This is supposed to be very easy. Cant find any help files. thank Hans
reviews.reply:
Hello! Thank you for the feedback.
Import of files should work the same. Please send to support@osmand.net file so we can check it. Also, you can try to re-convert the file using https://www.gpsvisualizer.com/convert_input.

reviews.review: 5 stars if you would make pausing the track for like one minute instead of six minutes. If you don't wait the six minutes it creates a track to connect to the last point that it pause.
great just great!
got for newbie hiker
great
Too many comercials make the menus confusing.
nice map
Payware. OSM maps are user-contributed but they want you to pay for them. Sucks.
reviews.reply:
Hello, Hugh! Thank you for the feedback.
You can use OSM maps for free in OsmAnd, we have an online layer. We charge for offline maps, that we prepare and store on our servers, so you can use search and navigation offline.
Also if you an active contributor you can get map updates and downloads for free, check OSM plugin for details.

reviews.review: Ok,
It's good software. Offers unparalleled online facilities! As a last point, use biometric authentication to increase security.
Very useful app for my mountain biking adventure 👍
Better ofline maps
Loved osmand! I have recommended it to so many of my friends and students. Now I'm unable to download a 3rd map... Useless.
Nice work, good maps, good offline, a lot of settings, but this app and screen, they together (like a friends) eat of lot power.

Generally good, but why does "speed" tab for routes display "slowness" instead? Speed is, by definition, distance divided by time, not vice versa. I never use the displayed thing anywhere and can't easily relate to particular values. Besides, make just one stop and the graph becomes useless: peaks to maximum and actually meaningful values at the bottom, so that you can hardly distinguish between 4, 5 and 6 km/h when hiking. EDIT: I don't want to filter anything, I want to see speed in km/h.
reviews.reply:
Hello, Anton! Thank you for the feedback.
The latest updates have a new option "GPS filter" you can find it in Options for each track, it allows you to filter GPS data to gain better geometry and graphs for your tracks.

reviews.review: The best offline map you can hope to get, but the GPS either has to have no voice prompts or LITERALLY informs you of the new calculated route time every 15 seconds with no way to turn that off. GPS would be absolutely perfect if I could just turn every voice prompt off except where to turn.

Je suis très heureux d'avoir cette application. Elle est très bonne à utiliser ,au cours des voyages. Vraiment c'est une belle application que je recommande vivement à mes parents et amis à télécharger, merci beaucoup pour ce beau travail.
My god it brings you the longest way,i used in my area,and it brought me all around the houses.rubbish
reviews.reply:
Hello, Victorija! Thank you for the feedback.
Please contact us at support@osmand.net and provide coordinates of the start and destination points of the route so we could test it.

reviews.review: Excellent
best app
Fantastic application

Hello, Emmanuel! Thank you for the feedback.
If you have any questions please contact us at support@osmand.net

reviews.review: I download the mod 🙂 free of cost 🙂
Great offline map

is a very good and useful application. the only downside is importing and using gpx maps. which is not exactly user-friendly. Unfortunately, the aid for importing maps is out of date the menu no longer looks like that in the description. would not spoil an update on this topic.
reviews.reply:
Hello! Thank you for the feedback.
Could you please provide more details about the issue?

reviews.review: Very nice and useable app 👍👍👍

Navigation instructions on small roads are only just usable. Lots of turns are not there IRL (road simply goes on) and other turns are not given. Requires lots of attention and checking the actual map.
A bloody great app!!

I really would like to like this, but it is just terrible. I like the idea of a gps app that does not store location data and that works fully offline, but when i look up a city thats only a half hour away and it has no idea what im talking about (this happens all the time) then its useless to me! the only way i've been able to get this to work right is to use specific cross streets. Cities, towns, and direct addresses do not work.
reviews.reply:
Hello! Thank you for the feedback.
We use OpenStreetMap as a source of data. This map is built by a community of volunteers, availability of data in some areas depends on the number of volunteers.

reviews.review: Fantastic app for hiking

Awesome app, but search needs to be a bit smarter. When I type the name of my city in "search by city", tens of the first results are streets that contains the name of the city and in the middle of those there is the actual city. Organic Maps seems to be better, you could learn from them :) But for anything else, this is a great use of osm data and philosophy.
great help
Good 👍
reviews.reply: Hello! Thank you for the feedback.

reviews.review: The map is exceptional
Useless for those hoping to use residential addresses
reviews.reply:
Hello! Thank you for the feedback.
You can try to use step-by-step "Address search" in Menu – Search – Address search – Select city.
If you have any other questions please contact us at support@osmand.net

reviews.review: Thank you for this app! It's really helped me
Please help. Trying to take advantage of the Sale for OsmAnd+ that is ending in 3 days, but keeps giving me an error. I am running out of time. Love this map app!

So far the best navigation system I have met and I have had many. Fast, beatifull and easy to use. The only thing so far is with the house numbers. I have seen better systems. The arrows showing where some restorant is are poor. A "V" would be easier to read.
Why don't the maps tilt during navigation? I mean in isometric or 3d view
Very helpful and precise app. I already use it multiple years for all my hikings

The very serious issue with this app is the difficulty in exiting it. Once it's navigating it stays running on your phone and exiting it is criminally difficult. Just google how do I exit osmand and you will find teams of discussion about this issue and it seems the developer is unresponsive about it. They once had an exit button and then removed it because they thought of something "better' but on many phones it doesn't work. Install this app at your peril. For nav? Who knows it may be OK...
reviews.reply:
Hello, Gordon! Thank you for the feedback.
You need to stop navigation or track recording to exit OsmAnd. You can do it thru the notification center, because both these services show notifications, and both have a 'Stop' button, or you can stop in the app, where you previously start it.

reviews.review: Useless for route planing with stopovers (POIs and map points mixed). Awfull user interface.
reviews.reply:
Hello, Michael! Thank you for the feedback.
Could you please provide more details about the issue?
You can contact us at support@osmand.net.

reviews.review: Love the wealthy feature sets, but the rendering speed is a pain sometimes, if the Dev can solve the rendering speed issue then this app will be a 5/5 stars for sure. P.S. I think the rendering speed is more to to with database performance than the actual rasterization, so optimising the underlying database could do more help than reinvent the graphics engine which IMHO is very good already
I downloaded this today for my biking trip in Kashmir. Disappointed to see part of Kashmir shown in Pakistan. Hence I am uninstalling
add Urdu (Pakistan) voice
reviews.reply:
Hello! Thank you for the feedback.
Language availability depends on the system's TTS engine, if it supports the needed language, you can use voice announcements.
If you have any other questions please contact us at support@osmand.net

Offers privacy in todays world. If your done with creepy corporations taking notes on how you spend your day then selling your routine to other companys to "target" Ads to you who just charged you more; for the products you would have bought anyway and since they had to pay another company money to find out your personal information then this IS the map solution for you. Simple no creep privacy maps solution.

reviews.review: لابأس به
good luck
Nice offline map

I installed the app today. For now, I like how it works. I would like the application to have the option to import addresses from contacts in the phone and save them as favorite locations. I would ask the development team to consider this suggestion for one of the following versions. Thanks.
Very detailed and accurate.

Absolutely terrible navigation for cycling. It literally makes you cross a street leaving a cycle path for a narrow sidewalk instead. Even when adding a way point it still goes to a sidewalk. And adding a way point makes no sense, it doesn't work at all. The most un-intuitive app I've ever used. Looks like something from 2008. And still no traffic data!
reviews.reply:
Hello! Thank you for the feedback.
You can try to change the "Driving style" option to "Prefer byways" in Menu – Navigation – Options.
If it doesn't help, please contact us at support@osmand.net with the coordinates of the route.

reviews.review: I use OSMAnd for navigating since 2021 and I find most of Manila's landmarks built before the year 2020.

Customer service is nonexistent. Purchased the full app, but it wouldn't transfer to a new device. Somehow when it did connect on the new device it charged me again for the full app. Contacted customer service four times since then, and I've heard nothing. It's been six months. I don't care what any of the features of this map are, the developers are trash.
Es excelente, se puede agregar track y puntos de referencia para estar con mapas offline, para ser mas completa seria bueno agregar gestion de pilogonos y mas tipos de archivos
Lots of adaptability and works well for following GPX tracks
Kelwin29gailcom

Well, seems I could not update my earlier comment. OsmAnd uses OpenStreetMap which for the area I checked is fully up to date. G. is clearly not. I wanted to check in OsmAnd, which showed way out of date. I tried to update NL, but only got part of the parts. So, OsmAnd was clearly out of date, and not manually updating. So, useless! And yes I paid for an other one to not have adds. Getting the adds again. Would you be more reliable? Your map isn't even at least up to date to two months ago!
reviews.reply:
Hello, Angela! Thank you for the feedback.
You can contact us at support@osmand.net with coordinates of the places that have not been updated for two months.

reviews.review: Pros: great community, lot of options, lot of infos and always updated Cons: can be dangerous cause map is not always updated but depends on users. Can't edit in app for road block or traffic problem. Navigator is great but can be dangerous, last time it tracked a bike road in a big forest but was not meant for cars. Hopefully we made it and I updated the track.
La uso durante il trekking con gli amici per pianoficare il percorso, e non ho trovato un app migliore. Davvero ben fatta
Why no 3D navigation view in driving mode (Android)? Significant deficit.
reviews.reply:
Hello, Chris! Thank you for the feedback.
We are working on adding a 3D view for the Android version, it is on the feature list for 2022.
If you have any other questions please contact us at support@osmand.net

reviews.review: I love the program. but anything that begs for reviews or worse stops me from using it when I need to, to pop a review box up automatically gets zero stars. developers: bulk low quality reviews probably don't get you anything. do not do this.
reviews.reply:
Hello, Trel! Thank you for the feedback.
The latest version of OsmAnd use Google Play dialog for review, you can ignore it. if it appears to often, please let us know.

Only at home I realized that there is separated language configuration for the map that I used. So 2 stars because in my trip I had lack of the internet and suffered much.

You can change "Map language" in Menu – Configure Map.

Horrible app I just really wanted a Google map alternative with privacy-focused features and no recommendations and other bloat when on my maps. Alas these apps are extremely behind and maybe in a few years I can use this as a Google maps alternative, also with so few features and you practically download the maps...why is it so slow?

App is great.
good free maps. worth every cent.

i am in Silang but i want to plan a route from Batangas City to Kamay Ni Hesus, Quezon City. I set the start and destination addresses but the program always starts in Silang where i am now. What am i doing wrong?
reviews.reply:
Hello, Brian!
Taping the "Start" button will launch navigation, which always starts from your current location, route calculation starts right after two points are added to navigation. You can try to use "Plan a route" to plan routes without location.
If you have any other questions please contact us at support@osmand.net

reviews.review: One of the Best app
